mapper.select:

from t_bill WHERE state = #{state,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND delete_state=0 limit #{offset},#{limit}

select

SELECT DISTINCT keywords FROM t_bill WHERE keywords NOT IN ( SELECT keywords FROM keywords_price) LIMIT 100
